**Tender Closing Date**: March 31, 2025, 2:00 PM Eastern Time

**Procurement Category**: SRVTGD

**Tender Status**: Open

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada

**Procurement Description**

Public Works and Government Services Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal for the Rental of Audio Visual Equipment and Simultaneous Interpretation. The equipment will be needed for a large event, and the expected duration of the rental is one day. The delivery date is October 29, 2022.

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is being conducted using the Rotational Sourcing procurement strategy. Suppliers are invited to submit a bid, and the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

The tender documents are available in both official languages of Canada. Suppliers must submit their bids in accordance with the tender documents and any amendments that may be issued.
